titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Women's Center, Yale University, Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Michael Lotstein

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday November 30, 2018 at 11:26

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The Women's Center, Yale University, records consists of administrative files, event records, publications, staffer journals and subject files from 1969 to 2014.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Women's Center, Yale University, records consists of administrative files, event records, publications, staffer journals and subject files from 1969 to 2014.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright for materials authored or otherwise produced as official business of Yale University is retained by Yale University. Copyright status for other collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

odd.head: General
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 9-B (YRG 9-B), Records of deputy, associate, and assistant deans of Yale College.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collection requires the permission of the Women's Center. Contact the University Archives for more information.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Women's Center, Yale University, Records (RU 1130). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Founded in 1970, the Yale Women's Center is an umbrella organization for groups on Yale's campus and beyond that deal with issues of gender and sexuality.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged alphabetically by series: Adminstrative files, Events, Publications, Reports, Staffer journals, and Subject files.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The records were tranferred from the Yale Women's Center, 2014.
